Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can draw two students who are trying to communicate with each other over a distance, with clear gestures indicating communication.
The student can illustrate a string telephone device accurately, showing cups and string connecting both students.
The student can represent the path of sound traveling through the string from one student to the other, perhaps with arrows indicating direction.
The student can show the device is made from materials like cups and string, accurately illustrating these components.
The student can highlight the importance of the device in helping the students communicate over a distance, possibly with annotations.
The student can explain in their drawing how this technology affects people's communication, using labels or short notes.
CANNOT: Minor gaps such as slightly uneven string lengths or cup sizes might be present, but these do not impact understanding.
Occasional incomplete labeling, such as missing one or two labels, though overall understanding is solid.
